segments.text: There's a big problem with my room . I'm in 507 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you tell me the nature of the problem , sir ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have cockroaches crawling in my room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Perhaps you saw a silverfish , sir .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've seen nine more cockroaches than I wanted to see .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sir , you haven't been drinking by any chance , have you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How dare you question my statement !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Forgive me . You're 100 percent correct . Allow me to transfer you to my supervisor .
segments.speaker: S2
